column7: TO THE FRONT AS A SPOTTER. RASHIV STAY CLOSE TO THAT AMMO CRATE. AND LAY LOW THEY MUST NOT KNOW WE'RE HERE! NOBODY MOVES UNTIL THE TANKS ARRIVE. I'LL WELCOME THEM WITH PIPE BOMBS
column8: THEN WE RAIN HELL ON THEM WITH EVERYTHING WE HAVE."

English: TANKS INCOMING. ABRAMS AND M60S. GET READY.
THE SECOND WAVE, MAJOR! SIMILAR TO THE FIRST! DO WE HAVE ENOUGH FIREPOWER?
DMITRI TO BAZA, THE TANKS WERE DESTROYED, OVER.
UNDERSTOOD, DMITRI. BUT MORE ARE COMING. GET RID OF THEM TOO. BAZA OUT.
RIGHT, WE'RE NOT DONE YET. RASHIV, THERE ARE MINES IN THOSE CRATES. LAY THEM ON THE ROAD.
THE'RE GETTING THROUGH! COME ON, STOP THEM!
EXCELLENT JOB, RASHIV, EXCELLENT! THIS WILL PUT THEM BACK SEVERAL DAYS! GREAT WORK EVERYBODY!
DAMN IT RASHIV, WHAT THE HELL HAVE YOU BEEN DOING? THEY'VE GOT THROUGH! AND GUESS WHOSE FAULT IS THAT!?
KEEP CALM AND LET THEM CLOSER.
